author: Filmento
description:
Get Surfshark with 4 extra months by using code FILMENTOVPN at checkout: https://surfshark.com/filmentovpn

The Witcher Season 4 replaces Henry Cavill as Geralt of Rivia with Chris Hemsworth's brother, Liam. And the result is one of the most hated and worst rated TV shows out there. Even worse than Ironheart and The Acolute. Oh my god. So let's continue our series of covering the worst TV shows to learn from the mistakes they make.

title: The Witcher Season 4 – How to Make the Most Hated Show on TV | Anatomy of a Failure
